page.title: 17THE BROOKE BOND OXO FACTORY
page.content: {Brooke Bond Oxo}is the largest single employer in Redbourn.It has a very large factory just by South Common.The company employs between {350}and{400}people on average.(We did a little research in school and found that over{10%}of the children have parents who work at{Brooke Bond). At the factory the main job is packing{tea}and{coffee}ready to be sent out to their depots across the country or sometimes a special order straight to the shops. The tea comes from many parts of the world including{India,China}and some parts of{Africa.}It is mixed in many different ways to make different blends of tea. The Coffee beans are roasted at this factory and then crushed.They are packed into jars which are then sealed.
